dao

Class EventDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.EventDao

  • public class EventDao
extends java.lang.Object
    The EventDao class executes SQL statements on the event database table.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.sql.Connection connection
      A connection to the database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      EventDao()
      A default constructor with no parameters

        public boolean validateEvent(Event event)
        Checks that the event is in the event table
        Parameters:
        event - An event to find in the table
        Returns:

      • getAllEventsForUser

        Gets all of the events for the given user
        Parameters:
        userName - The username of the user to find the events for
        Returns:
        An array of all events for that user
